bug_report.Summary: Status code 403 is displayed on all the site in the Console

Steps.ThirdStep: Click any Markets menu item [Forex / Indices / Cryptocurrencies / Commodities / Shares]
Steps.FourthStep: Click button [Buy] / [Sell] in widget "Trading instrument" when the price is updating

bug_report.ExpectedResult: Sign Up form is opened / Login form is opened / The page of the corresponding trading instrument on the trading platform is opened / The page "We're excited to see you here!" (depends on role and device)
bug_report.ActualResult: The page of the corresponding trading instrument is opened
